Package com.penthera.virtuososdk

Class Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common
  • public final class Common
extends Object
    Encapsulates common Virtuoso strings and constants

      Identifies a Advertising Support Type.

      Processing state of an asset that is currently being acted upon: undefined, ok, deleting, expiring
      static class  Common.AssetIdentifierType
      Identifies what kind of an asset (flat file or segmented video) a IIdentifier represents
      static class  Common.AssetStatus
      State of an asset: pending, downloading, errored, etc.

      Virtuoso's current authentication status with the Backplane
      static class  Common.BackplaneCallbackType
      Identifies the type of request or instruction in the IBackplaneObserver callback method.
      static class  Common.BackplaneResult
      Used in the IBackplaneObserver and ISubscriptionObserver.
      static class  Common.BackplaneSettingFlag
      Flags for determining which backplane settings have been modified in the Observers.IEngineObserver.backplaneSettingChanged(int) callback.
      static class  Common.Base64Serialization
      Utility class for performing Serialization and Deserialization of an object to a Base64 encoded string.
      static class  Common.EngineBlockedReason
      All the reasons that the download engine would report status as blocked.
      static class  Common.EngineStatus
      All the states that Virtuoso's download engine could be in: downloading, paused, disabled, etc.
      static class  Common.Events
      Identifies Virtuoso's Events, meaning "things that gets reported to the Backplane." Provides helper methods for instantiating Events that Virtuoso reports.
      static class  Common.FileSegmentType
      List of types for the individual segments of a segmented asset
      static class  Common.LicenseError
      Class encompassing the possible reasons for license failure.
      static class  Common.LogLevelHelper
      This class provides a static helper method which will deliver update messages to the necessary SDK processes to change the log level of the SDK.
      static class  Common.LogLevels
      Logging levels (levels of verbosity)
      These values are sent in the EXTRA_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGLEVEL extra in the CONFIGURE_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGGING Intent.
      static class  Common.Notifications
      Encapsulates the Extras and Intents used for notifications
      static class  Common.PlaylistDownloadOption
      Options that may be returned in response to a request for new asset details on a playlist.
      static class  Common.PlaylistItemStatus
      States for a playlist item within the autodownload feature.
      static class  Common.PlaylistStatus  
      static class  Common.PushService
      Identifies a Push Service Type.
      static class  Common.SettingFlag
      Flags for determining which settings have been modified in the Observers.IEngineObserver.settingChanged(int) callback.

    • Field Detail

      • START_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE

        public static final String START_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE
        Intent action to start the Virtuoso service. You must specify this in the Android Manifest as one of the Intent actions for the Virtuoso background service.

      • EXTRA_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGTOFILE

        public static final String EXTRA_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGTOFILE
        Extra sent with the CONFIGURE_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGGING Intent to configure the log to file. The value of this extra must be a boolean. True to log to file.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGLEVEL

        public static final String EXTRA_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGLEVEL
        Extra sent with the CONFIGURE_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE_LOGGING Intent to configure the log level. The value of this extra must be one of the values from LogLevels.
        See Also:
        Common.LogLevels, Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_FIREBASE_REMOTE_MESSAGE

        public static final String EXTRA_FIREBASE_REMOTE_MESSAGE
        Extras sent to the SubscriptionsService when a RemoteMessage is received. The value will be a Firebase RemoteMessage.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CLIENT_PACKAGE

        public static final String CLIENT_PACKAGE
        Name of the XML tag you must provide in the Android manifest. This string identifies the client and should be used as the client's provider authority. This string is also prepended to the notification Intent action strings, so that clients can intercept updates from the service and update the notification UI. Example snippet from your Android manifest: 
         
 <meta-data android:name="com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg" android:value="com.penthera.reference.provider" />
        See Also:
        Common.Notifications, VirtuosoSDKContentProvider, Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_HTTP_SOCKET_TIMEOUT

        public static final int DEFAULT_HTTP_SOCKET_TIMEOUT
        Default socket timeout for the download service (in ms). You can change the HTTP socket timeout via configure.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_HTTP_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT

        public static final int DEFAULT_HTTP_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
        Default connection timeout for the download service (in ms). You can change the HTTP connection timeout value via configure.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SETTING_NOT_SET

        public static final int SETTING_NOT_SET
        A constant value used to determine if a setting has been set or overridden.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNDEFINED

        public static final int UNDEFINED
        A constant value for undefined states and values
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FOREGROUND_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION_ID

        public static final int FOREGROUND_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION_ID
        Notification id used with the foreground service. Useful if you wish to update the notification outside of the updates controlled by the service via NotificationManager.notify(int, Notification) or NotificationManager.cancel(int)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASSET_RETRY_LIMIT

        public static final int ASSET_RETRY_LIMIT
        Limit for retries on asset downloads. This is the total number of consecutive failed attempts that the SDK will make to download an asset. This limit indicates repeated attempts. If the download fails on one attempt but then begins to work again on the next attempt then the counters are reset.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASSET_RETRY_ERROR_LIMIT

        public static final int ASSET_RETRY_ERROR_LIMIT
        Limit for retries on asset downloads represented as maximum number of errors that the SDK will encounter before stopping. This is the total number of consecutive errors encountered on the asset. If the download fails on one attempt but then begins to work again on the next attempt then the counters are reset.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOWNLOADER_THREAD_STATS_TAG

        public static final int DOWNLOADER_THREAD_STATS_TAG
        A tag value assigned to all download threads using TrafficStats.setThreadStatsTag() so that download quantities can be monitored. Prevents StrictMode warnings about untagged sockets.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HTTP_PROXY_THREAD_STATS_TAG

        public static final int HTTP_PROXY_THREAD_STATS_TAG
        A tag value assigned to all http proxy threads using TrafficStats.setThreadStatsTag() so that proxy quantities can be monitored. Prevents StrictMode warnings about untagged sockets.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTROL_REQUESTS_STATS_TAG

        public static final int CONTROL_REQUESTS_STATS_TAG
        A tag value assigned to all threads used exclusively for general control actions such as server syncs or fetching the current time. This is used with TrafficStats.setThreadStatsTag() so that these actions can be monitored. Prevents StrictMode warnings about untagged sockets.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • verifyLicense

        public static Common.LicenseError verifyLicense()
        Verify the status of the backplane license.
        Returns:
        The reuslt of the verification.

      • getAppProcessName

        public static String getAppProcessName​(Context context)
        A convenience helper method that provides the process name of the main process for this application. This is required when providing a custom configuration for WorkManager, either through Configuration.Provider or a custom workmanager initializer. The configuration requires the addition of a default process name Configuration.Builder.setDefaultProcessName(String). This method assumes that the main client process of the application will be the default process for WorkManager. The SDK assumes the same configuration.
        Parameters:
        context - A context to use to fetch the process details
        Returns:
        the application process name, or null in the case of an unrecoverable error.
